## mediaType variable

The `<audio>` tag supports 3 audio formats: MP3 (audio/mpeg), WAV (audio/wav), and OGG (audio/ogg).

**Signature:**

```typescript
mediaType: (ext: string) => {
    value: string;
    error?: undefined;
} | {
    error: Error;
    value?: undefined;
}
```
